DOC.brief_summary: Gay Poz Sex ( GPS ) HIV prevention sexual health promotion program HIV-positive gay bisexual men , take place group counsel format . All participant provide write informed consent outset study . Eligible participant fill 1-hour computer-assisted self-interview questionnaire . Subsequently , participant attend seven 2-hour group session , lead 2 peer facilitator , HIV-positive gay men , group 5-8 men . Immediately 3 month follow completion GPS program , participant schedule attend 1-hour session complete questionnaire package . Participants receive honorarium list community resource , include mental health substance use counseling service , end assessment . Participants also participate program evaluation interview 3-month follow-up assessment .
DOC.brief_title: A Small-group Intervention Reduce HIV Sexual Transmission Risk Behavior Among HIV-positive Men Who Have Sex With Men
DOC.criteria: In order eligible participate study , participant : 1. identify male , 2. report engage condomless anal sex another male past 3 month , 3. selfreport HIVpositive status , 4. age 18 year old , 5. able speak read English . Selfreported female gender , condomless anal sex another male past 3 month , HIVnegative
